Logged in a secondary character this evening that I haven't played in probably 6 months, and got this:

Welcome back! Here's some long-term experience boosts to help perk up your day! You have been awarded 50 Long-Term Experience Boosts! You may use the BOOST command to access this reward!

O.o

Might need to start playing him again.

Maylan
Wednesday, September 13th, 2017, 11:17:30 AM

@sabotage I must disagree. As Mogonis mentioned they're fantastic for Reim and Duskruin, but they are also great when you are chaining bounties back to back. And then you get the benefit of increased offline absorption and also a slight increase in online absorption unless you're in your lumnis period. I try to always have some long-term exp in the bucket. Sure you sacrifice some exp in the beginning, but the long-term benefits more then make up for it.
